description: A new adoption bill, which will replace the current law, is a "much-needed update", a minister says.
title: Proposed Isle of Man adoption law 'will reduce delays'
title_page: Proposed Isle of Man adoption law 'will reduce delays' - BBC News
maintext: It also states that the welfare of a child must be the "paramount consideration", instead of being the "first consideration" as it is written in the 1984 act, when any judgement is made.
